entry.em: ..HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT TUESDAY

entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
